Entry.JapaneseText: ハロルド
Entry.EnglishText: Harold

Entry.JapaneseText: チャット
Entry.EnglishText: Chat

Entry.JapaneseText: ガイ
Entry.EnglishText: Guy

Entry.JapaneseText: ふ〜ん、ここが機関室かぁ。 想像してたより、けれんみのない構造ね
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm, so this is the engine room. It's a less fancy structure than I imagined.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何か用ですか？ ハロルドさん
Entry.EnglishText: Do you need something, Ms. Harold?

Entry.JapaneseText: ここに来た理由なら、 ２５６種類ぐらい挙げられるけど、 一番の理由は暇つぶしね
Entry.EnglishText: If you're asking why I came here, I could list about 256 reasons, but the main one is to kill time.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたも同好の志…というか 科学者だもんな。 興味あって当然か
Entry.EnglishText: You're also of like mind... Well, you're a scientist. It's only natural to be interested.

Entry.JapaneseText: そういう事なら どうぞ見学していって下さい
Entry.EnglishText: If that's the case, feel free to take a look around.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうです？ この…
Entry.EnglishText: What do you think of this...

Entry.JapaneseText: あら、マクストン機関ね。 今となっちゃあ古臭いけど、 大出力を出すのに適した構造よ
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, it's the Maxton engine. It's a bit outdated now, but it's a structure suited for high output.

Entry.JapaneseText: 臨界トルクをざっと暗算するなら、 …そうねぇ理論値を越えて ３万エスト近く出るんじゃないの？
Entry.EnglishText: The estimated critical torque exceeds the theoretical value, nearing about 30,000 units.

Entry.JapaneseText: え、ええ…、 おっしゃる通りです…けど
Entry.EnglishText: Uh, y-yes...that's right...but...

Entry.JapaneseText: あらら？ どうしたの？ 機嫌悪そうだけど
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, dear? What's wrong? You seem upset.

Entry.JapaneseText: 説明したかったのに、 先に言われてしまったからじゃないのか
Entry.EnglishText: You wanted to explain, but she beat you to it, didn't she?

Entry.JapaneseText: こりゃあ、船長の生き甲斐を 奪ったようなもんかな
Entry.EnglishText: Well, this might feel like she have taken away the captain's raison d'être.

Entry.JapaneseText: そりゃ悪かったわねぇ。 ハイ、じゃあ、聞いてあげるから、 何か言ってみて
Entry.EnglishText: Well, that was thoughtless of me. Alright, then, I'll listen, so go ahead and say something.

Entry.JapaneseText: もう全部言われました！
Entry.EnglishText: I've already said everything!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ〜あ…
Entry.EnglishText: Oh dear...

Entry.JapaneseText: まあ、これも科学による 犠牲者ってヤツね
Entry.EnglishText: Well, this is also a casualty of science, huh?

Entry.JapaneseText: やれやれ…、なんて言い草だ
Entry.EnglishText: Good grief... that's what they say.
